mapper.select: SELECT sy.id, sy.serial_number AS serialNumber, sy.qr_code AS qrCode, sy.store_manage_id AS storeManageId, (select IF ( LENGTH( TRIM( sm.`sub_store_name` )) > 0, CONCAT( sm.`store_name`, '(', sm.`sub_store_name`, ')' ), sm.`store_name` ) AS storeName from store_manage sm where sm.id=sy.store_manage_id )AS storeName FROM store_yards sy ${ew.customSqlSegment}
